name: Fire Spin
description: You release a series of moving flames that dance around a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d8 + MOVE fire damage on a hit. as the flames swirl around it. As long as you maintain concentration, the target takes an additional 1d8 fire damage at the end of each of its next three turns.
higherLevels: The damage dice rolls for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

contest.effect: Temporarily stops the crowd from growing excited.
